=================================================
 
Based on letters and journals, many of which have never been published before, this tells the story of 1914-18 solely through the eyes of those who lived through it.
 
 
1/3 The story of 1914-18 based on the letters and journals of those who lived through WWI. 
 
2/3 Stories include a soldier's despair as he is transported to Siberia. 

3/3 Including the story of a German soldier caught up in a mutiny.
